comment.author: 69310932@N08
comment._content:
Ooops!
This Jimmy Stewart all right, but he is not shaking hands with Charles Lindbergh, as Lindbergh was close to the same height.  This gentleman, after some research, looks to be the original creator of RYAN aircraft, T. Claude Ryan.  This was obviously taken during the filming of the movie, THE SPIRIT of ST. LOUIS, probably about 1956.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
